body_html: @skulhare If you are able to migrate your workflow to use Tensorflow Lite for SSD model, we have been able to get much lower latencies by following the steps in [blog post](https://medium.com/tensorflow/training-and-serving-a-realtime-mobile-object-detector-in-30-minutes-with-cloud-tpus-b78971cf1193) we published recently. Then you dont need to use transform_graph.py

Then you dont need to use transform_graph.py
body: @skulhare If you are able to migrate your workflow to use Tensorflow Lite for SSD model, we have been able to get much lower latencies by following the steps in `[blog post](https://medium.com/tensorflow/training-and-serving-a-realtime-mobile-object-detector-in-30-minutes-with-cloud-tpus-b78971cf1193)` we published recently. Then you dont need to use transform_graph.py
